snippet: At the gathering in Brussels, President Robert G. Mugabe of Zimbabwe had sought to marshal a boycott for a major summit meeting to protest European influence.
abstract: Scores of European and African leaders and officials gather in Brussels for a major summit meeting overshadowed by bloodletting in the Central African Republic and lingering postcolonial resentments.
lead_paragraph: At the gathering in Brussels, President Robert G. Mugabe of Zimbabwe had sought to marshal a boycott for a major summit meeting to protest European influence.

headline.main: Postcolonial Resentments Loom Over Meeting of Europeans and Africans
headline.print_headline: Clouds Hang Over Meeting of Europeans and Africans

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
